summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image displays a section of a video game inventory screen focused on a material called "Flame Ebongold," categorized as a rare special crafting material. The player currently holds one unit of this item. The description accompanying the item reads: "When fortune forsakes you, your gold dulls to iron; yet when embraced by luck, even your iron sharpens to gold." It indicates that this material can be used for crafting weapons. The inventory also shows other materials, each with different quantities, alongside navigation options for examining, sorting, and returning to the previous screen. The player has a total of 6253 currency units visible in the top right corner.
